questions.title: Webextension firstrun
questions.body:
Could you advise me on a strategy to use for a browser webextension that starts Zeronet.
Currently initial setup requires coping and executing scripts. At best I'd like it to be invokable from ZN website.
Is the plugin right way to go or there is a frame api that can be used.

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/zeronet-helper/
